remarks: Convenient lemma for ~ f1otrg (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Mar-2019.)
statement:
f1otrkg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
f1otrkg.d $e |- D = ( dist ` G ) $.
f1otrkg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
f1otrkg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
f1otrkg.e $e |- E = ( dist ` H ) $.
f1otrkg.j $e |- J = ( Itv ` H ) $.
f1otrkg.f $e |- ( ph -> F : B -1-1-onto-> P ) $.
f1otrkg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( e e. B /\ f e. B ) ) -> ( e E f ) = ( ( F ` e ) D ( F ` f ) ) ) $.
f1otrkg.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( e e. B /\ f e. B /\ g e. B ) ) -> ( g e. ( e J f ) <-> ( F ` g ) e. ( ( F ` e ) I ( F ` f ) ) ) ) $.
f1otrgitv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
f1otrgitv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
f1otrgitv.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
f1otrgitv $p |- ( ph -> ( Z e. ( X J Y ) <-> ( F ` Z ) e. ( ( F ` X ) I ( F ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B e f g $.
$d D e f $.
$d E e f $.
$d F e f g $.
$d I e f g $.
$d J e f g $.
$d X e f g $.
$d Y f g $.
$d Z g $.
$d e f g ph $.
